title: Nero 8.2.8.0 (possibly above!) NeroPatentActivation+Neroblocker
description:
Nero Call-Home blocker by kEiNsTeiN
-----------------------------------


In combination with the Autoit-script (see Nero8Patentactivation\readme.txt), this is just perfect.
The benefit over installing a personal firewall to block nero is obvious.. less ressources wasted.
I "modded" the autoit script, it includes a few serials, a nag screen, and only the main program and Recode.
Adjust it to your needs!


------------


Simple IPSec Policy to keep Nero from contacting its validation Servers.
In other words: blocks all outgoing connections to ports: 52662 and 64697

If happen to have an application that runs on these as well, this will make it stop working.
If you notice anything unusual, delete the rule.


Step-by-step How-to:

------------ English ---------------

- Go to Start, Run, enter: "secpol.msc", press enter.
- rightclick "IP Security Policies on local computer"
- "All Tasks" -> "Import Policies" -> Choose my neroblocker.ipsec
- Rightclick the new rule ("Nero blocker"), and hit "Assign". Close.
Done.
